{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr reference operator[]( difference_type n ) const
    requires /*cartesian-product-is-random-access*/&lt;Const, First, Vs...&gt;;
}}

Returns an element at specified relative location. Equivalent to: {{c|return *((*this) + n);}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|position relative to current location}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The element at displacement {{c|n}} relative to the current location.
